DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Paradise AQ 8 Color Palette - EMPTY
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Paradise AQ 8 Color Empty Palette is a convenient palette in a sleek compact case that can be customized with your choice of eight 0.25 ounce Mehron face paints. Perfect for face and body painting professionals who are on the go. Please note that this is an empty palette and does not include any face paint. Face paint colors that will fit this palette are listed here.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Empty 8 color palette in a compact case
Easy for professionals on the go
Fits eight 0.25 ounce colors from Mehron
